rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 9 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 10:20 PM, 28 June 2025(Saturday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Bataan, Quezon, Cavite, Batangas, Laguna and Rizal within the next 3 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Metro Manila(Pasig, Mandaluyong, Manila, San Juan) and Zambales(San Antonio) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
